authors.name: Anjali Sharma
authors.affiliation: LIME Lab Low Profit LLC ; SDG Labs ; The Roeper School
authors.note: CEO of LIME Lab and SDG Labs

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2d7uk","text":"This protocol describes steps to capture, annotate, and label produce items as good or bad using the Grader App. The grader app is part of a larger system of systems conceived, designed, and developed by Anjali Sharma at SDG Labs, to reduce food waste using AI and robotics. The grader app is designed to leverage the power of citizen sourcing and AI to create an open image data set of good and bad produce items. The purpose of creating this open image data set is to help in training machine vision algorithms that can accurately differentiate between good and bad produce items. In this protocol I outline the steps following which, any citizen scientist can capture, annotate, and/or label good and bad produce items.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":204,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer:
{"blocks":[{"key":"2dm45","text":"This protocol is intended for use by citizen scientists utilizing the Grader App developed by Anjali Sharma. By using this mobile app and following the instructions outlined in this protocol, users acknowledge and agree to the following:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"523mk","text":"
User Responsibility: Users of the app are solely responsible for their own safety while using the app. They should exercise caution and follow all safety guidelines and regulations applicable to the use of mobile devices, particularly in environments where capturing images may involve risks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3238t","text":"
No Liability: Anjali Sharma, SDG Labs, LIME Lab Low Profit LLC (LIME Lab hereafter), and any associated institutions or individuals assume no liability for any accidents, injuries, damages, or losses that may occur while using the app. Users accept full responsibility for their actions and use the app at their own risk.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai70k","text":"
No Warranties: This protocol and the accompanying mobile app are provided "as-is," without any warranties, either expressed or implied. Anjali Sharma, SDG Labs, LIME Lab, and associated institutions do not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or suitability of the app for any particular purpose.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ataju","text":"
User Discretion: Users are encouraged to exercise their own discretion and judgment when using the app. They should take into consideration the specific circumstances and risks associated with capturing images of produce items, and act accordingly to ensure their safety and the safety of others.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vg3a","text":"
Indemnification: Users agree to indemnify and hold harmless Anjali Sharma, SDG Labs, LIME Lab, and associated institutions, their officers, employees, and affiliates from any claims, liabilities, damages, or expenses arising from their use of the app, including any violation of applicable laws or regulations.By using the Grader App, users acknowledge that they have read, understood, and accepted this disclaimer in its entirety. If users do not agree with any part of this disclaimer, they should refrain from using the app.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"dqlcr","text":"Always capture multiple images of the same food item to account for potential defects or inconsistencies in any single image.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91b3m","text":"Ensure the background is neutral and non-distracting, allowing the algorithm to focus solely on the food item. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqkks","text":"If capturing images in a public place, be mindful of privacy concerns and avoid capturing identifiable individuals in the background. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vlo7","text":"This protocol provides a structured approach to acquire food images using a mobile phone app, ensuring consistency and quality throughout the dataset.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"31hun","text":"Smartphone with high-resolution camera capabilities.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cj3p","text":"Specialized mobile app designed for food image collection.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2hhhe","text":"Tripod or stabilizing device (optional, but beneficial for consistency).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0mg3","text":"Calibration card with standard color swatches (for color correction).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm1gs","text":"Internet Connection","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dd98","text":"Lighting (Optional)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lao7","text":"Setup \u0026 Calibration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5i8fl","text":"Install the designated food image collection app on your mobile phone.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9d1f6","text":"Position the mobile phone on a stabilizing device or tripod to ensure consistent image angles and reduce camera shake.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43ioo","text":"Use the calibration card to calibrate the camera's color settings within the app. This step ensures that the colors captured are as true to real life as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"en5e4","text":"User Interface Familiarization","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apmhq","text":"Navigate through the app to familiarize yourself with its functionalities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dv58r","text":"Ensure the app settings are adjusted to capture images at the highest resolution available.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akj30","text":"Identify and understand any tagging or labeling features within the app, that can be useful for immediate classification of images during the acquisition phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3344i","text":"Image Capturing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35dsg","text":"Position the food item in a well-lit environment. Natural light is preferred, but if not available, ensure the lighting is as neutral as possible to avoid color casts.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vimn","text":"Using the app, capture the image from a standardized angle (e.g., top-down or frontal). If the study requires multiple angles, make sure each is consistently applied across all food items.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52bga","text":"For diverse representation, capture the same food item in various stages or conditions (e.g., raw, cooked, plated).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29q6v","text":"If the app has a feature for immediate labeling, tag or label the image accordingly (e.g., fruit, raw).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c1qj7","text":"Review \u0026 Retake","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buseb","text":"After capturing, review the image on the mobile device. Check for clarity, focus, and accurate representation of the food item.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2km7a","text":"If the image doesn't meet the criteria, adjust the setup or lighting if needed and retake the photo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8tq40","text":"Data Transfer \u0026 Storage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o9if","text":"Use the app's export feature, if available, to transfer images to a secure database or cloud storage. Ensure images are exported in a lossless format to retain maximum quality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"djg77","text":"Regularly backup the dataset to avoid data loss.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eh8n9","text":"Quality Assurance","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efd6v","text":"Periodically, review the acquired images on a larger screen to ensure consistency and quality.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8u2ql","text":"Use the app's analytics or reporting features, if available, to track the number, diversity, and categories of images acquired.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
